vsParam:
How did it go, Nelke? Have you got
a better understanding...of the alchemy in this world?
Yes, Bergamot, thanks to Master Peppermint and [px]'s help.

Oh my~ Really~ That's wonderful.
Well done~ Master Peppermint~
(Hmm, I'm really flattered and embarrassed... Hazel...)

Is... Is that so, huh?!
Anyway, I'm their master!!!

Yeah. Master offered us many assignments,
and I really appreciate it!
By the way, um... This "Special Puha Box" concerns me a bit...

Oh, it's the "Special Puni Screaming Box". You should
know the exact names of items as a qualified alchemist.

I... I see!
But what is this "Special Puni Screaming Box"...
Huh? Sensei, I don't think Nelke meant its name?

Oh... You mean how it works? We put Puni models in the box.
Punis will pop out and attack the enemies when attacked.

The Puni models are made of very hard material...
So on triggered, they'll make your ankles hurt badly for 3 days.

Oh... Huh?
You know that so clearly, maybe...

Bergamot Sensei.
... Did you ever trigger it?

Do... Do not give me that look, [px].
Every alchemist has their own practice method.

Well...
Every alchemist has their own practice method.

Ahem, anyway, you're supposed to master
all the characteristics of the items as a qualified alchemist.

Not only the making method, but also the use method and effect...
You should bear every detail of the items in mind.

Alchemy is with very strong power. It'll cause damage
to yourself or people around you if you fail to control it.

Do bear that in mind, Nelke.
You too, [px].

Yeah, that reminds me of something.
I heard it from my uncle...

Once, it's said Puni models of various colors jumped
wildly in the Academy which caused an uproar.
Could it be caused by Bergamot Sensei...

... Gosh, it's time for class.
Nelke, keep trying. See you.

Oh, he escaped! Wait, Sensei!
Did you cause that incident!?
Yeah. Even an alchemist like Bergamot Sensei has a lame start.

Yeah, sure. Whether it's powerful warriors,
or famous alchemists or royal chefs——

Everyone is ordinary at the very beginning.
The point is to have a dream and keep pursuing it.

You know I'm the Student Union President, aren't I?
... But that's what someone else said.

Good for you, Hazel.
The point is to have a dream and keep pursuing it——
I'll bear the usage of items and this saying in mind.
... Yeah, please make sure to remember that ♪
